subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Team USA, the youngest hockey team at the Olympic tournament, beat Canada 5-3 in a win spurred by Brian Rafalski, the oldest American player on the ice.
snippet: Team USA, the youngest hockey team at the Olympic tournament, beat Canada 5-3 in a win spurred by Brian Rafalski, the oldest American player on the ice.
